name: frmdelbas
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cword(c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c1, cword(c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cword(c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c1, cword(c2)))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cword(c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c1, cword(c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈ Word(c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 → c1 = Word(c2))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c1, cword(c2)), wcel(c2, universe))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ c1, c1 = Word(c2), c2 ∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c1, cword(c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
-| wi(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(c1, cword(c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cword(c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
-| wi(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(c1, cword(c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cfrmd, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c2 ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ c3 =(freeMnd ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cword(c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(c1, cword(c2)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cfrmd, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈ Word(c2))
⊣ (c2 ∈ 𝕌 → c1 = Word(c2))
⊣ c3 =(freeMnd ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(c1, cword(c2)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cfrmd, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c2 ∈ 𝕌 → c1 = Word(c2))
⊣ c3 =(freeMnd ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cword(c2)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cfrmd, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈ Word(c2))
⊣ c3 =(freeMnd ` c2)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)

comment: An element of the base set of a free monoid is a string on the generators. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2016.)
